DOC.brief_summary: Juvenile idiopathic arthritis (JIA) is often associated with chronic anterior uveitis. Presence of vision threatening complications may indicate immunosuppressive therapy. In this study, the experience with cyclosporine A (CsA) as mono- or combination-therapy is analyzed.
DOC.brief_title: Cyclosporine A in the Treatment of Juvenile Idiopathic Arthritis (JIA) Associated Chronic Anterior Uveitis
